item.title: Consumer sentiment falls to 29-month low. Uncertainty rises due to Trump actions.

item.title: ‘I’m not sure what to do’: My husband has dementia and needs care. Will Medicaid go after our money if I use it to pay off our mortgage?
item.description: “We still have around $300,000 left on our mortgage.”

item.title: Banks are feeling the strain as lower-income consumers struggle with inflation and tariff chaos
item.description: Banks are seeing lower credit-card spending, while delinquencies are rising.

item.title: People are ignoring streaming and TV ads. This company is capitalizing on that.
